title: Halden's Legacy Unveiled
outcome: Three days after the Halden-Index AI's self-suspension, Halden's personal archives unlock. Fragments of journals and system designs surface, revealing he anticipated collapse and embedded safety mechanisms within the BCI. Oksana leads a citywide effort to rebuild using Halden's guidance, while the Council fractures as they interpret his intentions differently. Public unrest surges as conflicting visions of Halden's legacy clash, culminating in a grassroots movement to dismantle the Council and form a new citizen assembly inspired by Halden's original ideals of transparency and human agency.

events.description: Halden's encrypted personal logs are released, showing he foresaw system collapse and left coded safety protocols within the BCI.
Oksana hosts public forums to interpret Halden's guidance. Citizens debate the meaning of his warnings and question the Council's legitimacy.
Factions fracture as Council members argue over Halden's true intent. Some advocate complete transparency; others want to restore BCI with stricter control.
Grassroots groups coordinated by former high-score citizens propose dismantling the current Council and electing a new citizen assembly chosen openly by public nomination.
Amid swelling protests, the Council's authority collapses. The new citizen assembly is formed, pledging to rebuild Stenograd around transparency, local governance, and voluntary cooperation.
